games.title: Rise of the Dead
games.description: Dive into the intense universe of Rise of the Dead, a post-apocalyptic city filled with undead. As a brave survivor, your goal is to reclaim territories, eliminate zombies, and rescue others. Enjoy this free online game on your phone or computer, testing your strategy and combat abilities.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:  
    Movement:  Arrow keys (W A S D)  
    Shoot:  left click 
    Reload:  R  
    Punch:  E
    Change weapon: Q
    Use prop 1:  G
    Use prop 2: F
    Zoom: Scrollbar

Mobile Controls:  
    Movement:  Virtual Joystick [Joystick Image]  
    Actions:  Tap corresponding buttons

games.title: Zombie Derby 2
games.description: Zombie Derby 2 is a fast and fun driving game with zombies everywhere. Get in your car, run over the undead, and try to survive as long as you can. Use your fuel wisely - if you run out, the zombies will catch you. Collect upgrades, unlock new cars, and use nitro boosts to jump over hills and smash through big groups of zombies.
games.howToPlayText:
Accelerate - W/Arrow up
Shoot gun - Spacebar
Use nitro - Left Shift/N
Tilt forward/backward - Left/Right arrow or A/D

games.title: Zombie Space Episode II
games.description:
NEW ISSUE OF GALACTIC NEWS

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ON THE RED PLANET...
- Zombie virus has spread among civilians.
- Rescuers found survivors among the zombies.
- The galactic government has urgently gone on vacation.

★★★
A zombie virus outbreak has occurred on the space station. The first group of mercenaries disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You have to fight a horde of zombies using various types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use the abilities of the characters in hot battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or solo!
★★★

games.title: Find the Vampire
games.description:
Looking for an exciting vampire game? This is a casual 3D game where you act as a hunter to put an end to the vampire uprising. Your task is to identify the bloodsuckers among us, destroy them and free the city from the threat.

In this game, vampires disguise themselves as ordinary people, animals and even objects. Use unique exterminator kits and detectors to expose the hidden enemies. Unlock new areas, complete various levels and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.

KEY FEATURES:
- Vampire Exterminator Kits: Get new tools to fight the bloodsuckers.
- Search Among Us: Vampires can be anyone - from neighbors to trees.
- Rescue Citizens: Free people from vampire isolation.
- New Locations: Complete levels in different areas of the city.
- Vampire Tactics: Vampires become more cunning with each level.
- Story Levels: Each location reveals a unique story.
games.howToPlayText: The goal of the game is to identify and destroy all disguised vampires, save the citizens, defeat the Vampire Lord and stop the uprising, freeing the city from the threat.

games.title: Check Wednesday Phone!
games.description:
Check Wednesday Phone! creepy-cute game inspired by the Netflix series. Read messages, solve mysteries, explore Nevermore’s secrets and play gothic mini‑games.

Enter Wednesday Addams' digital world in this dark, twisted game. Check emails from Nevermore students, change your gothic phone theme, play eerie mini‑games, and explore her secret-filled dorm. Earn coins doing tasks Wednesday would probably mock — but you’ll need them to unlock the next mystery.
games.howToPlayText: Tap Wednesday’s phone to begin. Read cryptic emails, change to delightfully gloomy wallpapers, earn coins, and explore her eerie room. Click on strange objects, crack passwords, and uncover secrets hidden in Nevermore. Watch for new messages—they guide the story.

games.title: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
games.description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is an engaging survival game where you fly on a magic broom, fighting waves of enemies. Play online for free, hone your skills, unlock spells, and upgrade brooms. Choose between practice or endless challenge modes. Experience the captivating adventure and see how long you can endure!
games.howToPlayText:
PC Controls
WASD or Arrows = movement
Space = broom leap / rush
Z = choose to take the first spell
X = choose to take the second spell
C = choose to take the third spell
Mobile Controls
Joystick = movement
Rush Button = leap/ rush

games.title: SWAT and GREENS vs Zombies
games.description: Engage in SWAT and GREENS vs Zombies, a thrilling strategy game where you defend humanity from a zombie apocalypse. Enjoy online gameplay without downloads, equip over 50 unique weapons, and face endless undead waves. Test your skills in various modes and strive for victory in PvP battles.
games.howToPlayText:
"SWAT & GREENS vs Zombies" is an engaging tower defense strategy game where you can upgrade and unlock new members of the SWAT squad as well as plants. Together, they will stand against waves of advancing zombies.

 Upgrade SWAT members and plants to create a stronger squad.
- Each member of the special forces squad comes equipped with unique weaponry, strategically position them on the battlefield.
- Every plant has a cooldown period; use their powers wisely in combat.
- Strive to minimize losses in battle to maximize the level completion reward.

Battle Controls:
Drag SWAT members and plants onto the field by holding down the left mouse button/touchscreen.

games.title: Monster Makeup 3D
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Monster Makeup 3D, where you can creatively disguise monsters as humans to hide them from prying eyes. Use various tools to change their features seamlessly, but be cautious—one mistake could backfire! Enjoy this free online game on any device.
games.howToPlayText:
Features:
- Excellent 3D art style.
- Funny animations.
- Hilarious Failure experience.
- Satisfying ASMR feel.
- Get a stunning response in the end.

games.title: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive
games.description: Defend your base from hordes of zombies by shooting them with various weapons and placing turrets, barricades and traps
games.howToPlayText:
On Mobile: Drag your finger on the screen — your character moves in the chosen direction
On PC: Use WASD or arrow keys to move

games.title: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor
games.description: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor – A 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle the undead, explore vast locations, uncover dark secrets, and fight to survive in a mysterious, deadly new reality.
games.howToPlayText:
Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor  - is an 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.. Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!


A huge location populated by a wide variety of inhabitants!

The quiet life of the middle lane is disrupted by a mysterious catastrophe – an unknown phenomenon turns people into the living dead. The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..

Gameplay Features:

• Exploring a post-apocalyptic world 
• Interacting with the few survivors
• Search for resources and create equipment
• * Battles with different opponents
• Thrilling zombie apocalypse storyline
• Realistic arsenal of weapons

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the post-apocalypse! Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!

Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACE - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- MOUSE WHEEL, Q - change weapons.
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.
- M - map.

games.title: Halloween Stickman 2
games.description: Halloween Stickman 2 offers an exhilarating gaming experience where you navigate a mischievous, spooky environment. Play online for free and dive into a Halloween-themed adventure as you outsmart your trickster friend, Stickman, to seek revenge amidst the festive chaos.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.
It is necessary to watch the story animation and choose a way to punish the Stickman. You need to click on the buttons to see all the punishments of the Stickman.

games.title: Halloween Stickman
games.description: Halloween Stickman is an exciting adventure game where you can exact revenge on your tricky friend by rewinding time. Set in a spooky atmosphere, experience a captivating story with your choices influencing the outcome. Play for free on any device, and immerse yourself in this thrilling 2D horror journey.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or a finger.
It is necessary to watch the story animation and choose a way to punish the Stickman. You need to click on the buttons to see all the punishments of the Stickman.

games.title: Moto X3M Spooky Land
games.description:
Moto X3M: Spooky Land is a spooky Halloween edition of the popular bike racing series. Put on your helmet, hop on your motorbike, and ride through haunted tracks filled with creepy traps, bone-made obstacles, and eerie surprises. Speed is key – beat the clock while avoiding deadly hazards and pulling off flips to save precious time!

The controls are simple – use the arrow keys to accelerate, brake, and tilt your bike for smooth landings. Each of the 32 levels introduces new spooky challenges, making the game both thrilling and tricky. For fans of off-road biking and Halloween fun, Moto X3M: Spooky Land is the perfect ride!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD or ARROWS 
Press the up arrow key to accelerate
Balance your bike with the left and right arrow keys
Break by pressing the down arrow key
Perform flips and other stunts to gain time
Don't crash
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/moto-x3m-spooky-land?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Telekinetic Pumpkin
games.description:
Telekinetic Pumpkin is an arcade game where an experiment aimed at creating a magnificent, oversized pumpkin for Halloween takes an unexpected turn, resulting in the creation of a telekinetic pumpkin.


You’re a Pumpkin that teleports and moves objects with its mind! Destroy drones by smashing them, and collect power-ups to stay alive. Select your upgrades and try to survive as long as possible.
games.howToPlayText: Double-click on a location to teleport. Click and drag anything to move it with your mind (boxes, enemies, or power-ups). Every 35 seconds, you can select a random upgrade or ability to help you survive longer.
